author.bio: American Ranger is a rustic leather company.
author.bio_html: American Ranger is a rustic leather company.

body:
Different parts of the US are requiring temperature checks just to enter the grocery store, this will one day evolve into scanning your skin for the 666 qr code. Don't have it? Sorry, you can't enter the grocery store. 

When the antichrist comes, Christians will know he is the antichrist and the liberal machine will call us conspiracy theorists, tin foil hat wearers. 

The beast system is here, it is in its infancy stage.
body_html:
Different parts of the US are requiring temperature checks just to enter the grocery store, this will one day evolve into scanning your skin for the 666 qr code. Don't have it? Sorry, you can't enter the grocery store.

When the antichrist comes, Christians will know he is the antichrist and the liberal machine will call us conspiracy theorists, tin foil hat wearers.

The beast system is here, it is in its infancy stage.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body: If there will ever be a Whore of Babylon it's Christianity, and if there will ever be a Mark of the Beast it's the lawlessness and satanic triad-idol you already willlingly serve and worship. You're waiting for nothing. And yes, you are the dumbest kind of tin-foil hats if you think God will condemn and pour his wrath over temperature checks when entering grocery stores or RFID chips. It's unbelievable how spiritually corrupt, blind and perverted you idol worshippers are.
body_html: If there will ever be a Whore of Babylon it's Christianity, and if there will ever be a Mark of the Beast it's the lawlessness and satanic triad-idol you already willlingly serve and worship.
